summary: A wrapper class that loads a SentencePiece model and manages special tokens, offering functionality to convert text to token IDs and back, retrieve token strings, and access token identifiers for common special symbols such as BOS, EOS, PAD, MASK, etc., with optional legacy behavior.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of SentencePiece tokenization into NLP workflows, allowing models to receive properly encoded inputs and produce interpretable outputs while handling custom special tokens.
